item.title: Phasmophobia sales top one million on consoles, total sales approach 22 million
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/phasmophobia-sales-top-one-million-on-consoles-total-sales-approach-22-million

  • PC
  • PS VR2
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

"The best Christmas present we could have wished for," Kinetic Games CEO says.

The Early Access version of four-player cooperative psychological horror game Phasmophobia has sold over one million units across PlayStation 5, PlayStation VR2, and Xbox Series, just 35 days after its console launch on October 29, developer and publisher Kinetic Games announced.

Phasmophobia first launched in Early Access for PC via Steam on September 18, 2020, and has now sold almost 22 million units across all platforms.

“This incredible achievement is only possible thanks to our wonderful, supportive and engaged community,” said Kinetic Games CEO and lead developer Daniel Knight in a press release. “The entire team here at Kinetic Games could not be happier, reaching this milestone is the best Christmas present we could have wished for.”

item.title: Sea Fantasy for PC launches January 7, 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/sea-fantasy-for-pc-launches-january-7-2025

  • PC

Pixel art open-world action RPG dated.

The PC version of pixel art open-world action RPG Sea Fantasy will launch via Steam on January 7, 2025 for 1,650 yen, a month ahead of its previously planned February 2025 release window, developer METASLA announced. It will support English, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese language options. Unspecified console versions are also planned.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Save the world by fishing! This is a brand new action RPG game in which two young men set out on an adventure to fish for the SeaAZ, the marine life of this world, in a vast pixel world. This is not a peaceful fishing game. The destruction of the world is imminent….

About

  • Fishing Action – When you find a fish shadow, match the marker and throw the rod. Match the timing of the gauge to reduce the health of the SeaAZ and catch the SeaAZ! Don’t forget to strip the materials from the SeaAZ you caught.
  • Adventure by Ship – Explore the vast pixel world freely by boat.
  • Dungeon Exploration – There is more than just fishing. There may be dungeons on the islands you land on by boat. Explore them and get treasures! But beware of traps…
  • Craft – Create new fishing rods and hooks using materials obtained from the SeaAZ.
  • Epic Story – This is not a peaceful fishing game. The destruction of the world is imminent…

Watch the latest trailer (from September) below.

Announce Trailer
